name: Fortnite 2: Love on the Battlefield
description:
"I liked 100% of this game." -Vinny Vinesauce

A new romantic twist on the game of the century, take control of one of the greatest Battle Royalers of all time on their quest to find the sweet, succulent true love.

For those controls, you're gonna wanna be able to click with that mouse of yours, and hit the Spacebar to advance the dialogue. Luckily for you, if you only have a Spacebar and no other key, you can still play this game. This is what I would describe as the future.
